projects.title: Thomasville Foodie
projects.description: A food ordering app which shows dishes from local restaurants. This app allows creation of user accounts, includes payment processing, and includes order history in the user's account information page.

projects.title: Bad Bank
projects.description: An intentionally insecure Banking app that allows processing transactions, and viewing the transactions on the transactions page.

projects.title: MBTA Bus Tracker
projects.description: This application tracks the real time movements of the buses in the City of Boston using the MBTA Rest API.

projects.title: mv_frontend_challenge_1
projects.description: A newer version of Bad Bank using a different context API, improved styling, and reusable components.
